ns1:createOrderLineResponseType.ns1:remark:
Hello %FIRSTNAME% %LASTNAME%! Thank you for purchasing %GAMENAME%!

Please print this e-mail and archive it in a safe place. The included information is required to unlock the game or to receive customer support.

If you made the purchase using the Buy Now link inside the game, the full version should be already unlocked. If it isn't, please follow the these steps:

  • Launch %GAMENAME% from the Windows Start menu, or using the desktop shortcut.
  • When the game start window appears, click the Unlock button. A new window will open.
  • Enter the Order ID %IDTRAN% in the corresponding text field, then click the Activate button.
  • The game will connect to an activation server, and will be unlocked in less than a minute. Please wait until you see the Game Unlocked message appear. If you have a firewall, please allow the connection.
  • If something goes wrong while trying to unlock the game, please click the Help button and follow the instructions in the Troubleshooting section.
  • Enjoy your full version of %GAMENAME%.
